quotes.quote: The greatest achievements are those that benefit others
Write injuries in dust, benefits in marble.
For dogs we kings should have lions, and for cats, tigers. The great benefits a crown.
Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to others
I have found that among its other benefits, giving liberates the soul of the giver.
In America the young are always ready to give to those who are older than themselves the full benefits of their inexperience.
When one side benefits more than the other, that's a win-lose situation. To the winner it might look like success for a while, but in the long run, it breeds resentment and distrust.
Every adversity, every failure, and every heartache, carries with it the seed of an equivalent or greater benefit
When every benefit received is a right, there is no place for good manners, let alone for gratitude.
If you put in the work, put in the time, put in the effort, you're going to reap the benefits.
How terrible it is to have wisdom when it does not benefit those who have it.
A benefit is estimated according to the mind of the giver
It is wickedness when you only enjoy the benefit of a country and not contribute to the development of the country.
Time is needed to convert all ideas and added values into the tangible products that benefits the world.
The real destroyer of the liberties of the people is he who spreads among them bounties, donations and benefits.
I hope that what I am today is of positive benefit to other people
For every benefit you receive a tax is levied
Wise men, when in doubt whether to speak or to keep quiet, give themselves the benefit of the doubt, and remain silent.
Nothing will benefit human health and increase the chances for survival of life on Earth as much as the evolution to a vegetarian diet.
Heaven is a wonderful place and the benefits for the believer are out of this world!
